data.name: Wizard_ClubUpdateFailed

data.name: Wizard_InvalidCredentials
data.value: An error occurred while uploading the data. You do not have the required permissions to upload this data. Use another account (with the required permissions) to upload the data, or contact the responsible of the competition to request the appropriate access rights.

data.value: User selected an entry on the NewMatchday window that was not a Match or DateTime

data.value: A network error occurred while uploading the data.
